”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Terribly assembled movie reviews done by two commoners who go by Dylan and Tommy. Tommy posses an ever growing library of 500+ films and an uncanny ability to stand very still and silent when provoked causing 11/10 predators to leave him be. Dylan has an addiction of buying physical copies of movies only to use the digital codes and can cook minute rice in a mere 52 seconds. Together they will inconsistently put out poorly made reviews weekly with their old laptop and an operating budget of $33
